title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 262.1 - Statement of purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 262.1 - Statement of purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to set forth the methods and
procedures governing the availability, location and nature of those records of
the board subject to the provisions of article 6-A of the Public Officers Law, known as the Personal Privacy Protection Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
262.1

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
